Class OrderServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
io.fusion.air.microservice.adapters.service.OrderServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
OrderService
@Service @RequestScope public class OrderServiceImpl extends Object implements OrderService
Order Service Order Processing is implemented with Spring State Machine 1. Request for Credit 2. Payment Processing 3. Shipping the Product
